articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT 🦄Ariana The Techie
I’ve been a software engineer for 8 years.
But in 2019 I attended @AfroTech conference that changed my life. Where I heard a presentation from @RobTG4 and he challenged audience to go home and learn solidity. 
Here I am 3 years later, coding with $3M🙏🏾 https://afrotech.com/26-year-old-ariana-waller-raises-3-3m-seed-round-for-mueshi-a-fine-art-nft-marketplace
